title: Luxury Concierge Company MLevel Concierge and Remy Martin Host a Special Louis XIII Legacy Experience
text:
Luxury Concierge Company, MLevel Concierge, partnered with Remy Martin to bring together some of the most affluent individuals for a unique intimate dinner and cognac tasting designed to celebrate the extraordinary brand of Remy Martin Louis XIII.
Los Angeles, CA (PRWEB) October 20, 2015
The private dinner event was held on Friday, October 2nd, in an exclusive Hollywood Hills mansion in Los Angeles, California. The event was also co-hosted by private jet company Air Partner and Elite Traveler Magazine.This intimate group of distinguished guests were handpicked by MLevel Concierge from the world of art, fashion, film/TV, music, sport and business. This exciting evening took the guests on an enthralling journey covering the history of the acclaimed French winemaker and their popular cognac brand Louis XIII.
Some of the highlights of this special event were as follows.
Christophe Namer, the Louis XIII Ambassador took guests on a journey through the legacy of Louis XIII.
Chef Jeffrey Nimer prepared an exquisite tasting menu and spoke to all dinner guests as to why he prepared this special menu.
At dinner Remy Martin provided a beautiful video of the rich history and the effort that goes into making Louis XIII.
All guests entered a private room showcasing a 150 year old barrel that once held the rare Louis XIII.
Christophe brought up Peter Kent from the PGA to open a new bottle of Louis XIII and everyone was poured a glass.
Christophe instructed everyone on very special techniques to make the tasting an unforgettable experience.
Remy Martin is one of the most renowned French wine producers specializing in Cognac Fine Champagne. Louis XIII is one of their most exceptional products that offers a blend of 1200 eaux-de-vie from Grand Champagne, aged from 40 up to 100 years through 4 generations of Cellar Masters.
Co-host Air Partner is an air charter company based in the United Kingdom. They have 21 offices in Europe, North America, the Middle East and Asia, and offer private and air freight flights. Their rich history, unrivalled experience and financial stability has made them the first choice for heads of state, governments, Fortune 500 companies and private individuals worldwide.
Co-host Elite Traveler magazine is no stranger to innovation and creativity. Offering the ultra-high-net-worth private jet travelers the most engaging and captivating offers in the market, 2015 will see the magazine deliver an exciting new re-launch.
As an exclusive lifestyle and luxury concierge company , M Level Concierge is dedicated to offering specialized experience packages and exclusive perks to the world's most prestigious events, creating unique and memorable experiences for its clients. MLevel Concierge has created the number one lifestyle concierge and management firm specializing in luxury travel to unique events including, but not limited to Formula 1 racing, unique international festivals, tennis championships, professional golf, football, and fashion events.
A representative from MLevel Concierge Casey Roy said, “We were extremely happy to co-host this event with Remy Martin and our luxury partners. The level of luxury in which Remy Martin exudes was more than we expected and was quite impressive. This event gave us the opportunity to create a special evening in front of an exclusive group of guests.” Louis XIII ambassador Christophe Namer said, “Our partnership with MLevel Concierge has always been something that is important to the Remy Martin brand. Their level of clientele has a sophistication and understanding of what it is to be part of the Louis XIII legacy."
About M Level Concierge: MLevel Concierge is an exclusive lifestyle and luxury concierge company created by five of the top international high-end concierge agents from around the world. This elite group’s ultimate goal is to offer a one-stop shop to fulfill all the high-end lifestyle needs of their high profile clients with flawless execution.
